bibl.author: Macdonald, Ariane
Imaeda, Yoshiro
bibl.title: Choix de documents tibétains conservés à la Bibliothèque nationale complété par quelques manuscrits de l'India Office et du British Museum
bibl.note: Fascimiles of selected Dunhuang mss. mainly from the Pelliot collection, with two India Office Library mss. as well (where these are connected with the Pelliot mss.). 2 vols.
